name: 24C (Beta 0.1 Demo)
description:
VVVVVV but you jump instead of flipping

24Colors / 24C is a VVVVVV-Styled Platformer.

I have been working on this game for 2 months at least for this version, this demo is for demonstrating the concept.

and let's just say I sorta rushed the demo

Features in the future will allow the game to look less like a VVVVVV fan game.

Anyways, thank you for taking the time to play my game.

for now just collect all the trinkets
